ui_project_line.c

Builds the “Project and Lines” UI and distribute callbacks

Summary
ui_project_line.cBuilds the “Project and Lines” UI and distribute callbacks
PublicPublic functions.
Functions
project_line_setup_uiAssembly the project/lines widget.
project_line_info_updateUpdate information shown about the selected project or line
project_line_importImport line or project
project_line_exportExport selected line or project
project_line_freeFrees memory related to project and line
PrivatePrivate functions.
Functions
project_line_get_selectedPut selected iter in iter and return true if there is a selection.
project_line_renameRename a projet or a line upon double click
project_line_loadLoad a selected project or line from file

project_line_load

static void project_line_load(void)

Load a selected project or line from file

The selected line or project is loaded from file, upon selection.
